attributes.action: immediately resign and put Phil Woolas in charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Phil Woolas has announced he is to bring immigration 'under control'.  For that he must be put in charge of the country and get rid of the useless and now worthless fraud, Gordon McBroon

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
